vodka and orange.description: A distilled alcoholic beverage made from fermented grain mash and fresh orange juice

rum and coke.description: A popular distilled alcoholic beverage made from sugarcane with the timeless coca-cola.

gin and tonic.description: A distilled alcoholic beverage flavored with juniper berries and other botanicals with tonic water.

mai thai.description: A tropical cocktail made with rum, lime juice, orgeat syrup, and various fruit flavors.

long island.description: A mixed drink made with vodka, tequila, rum, gin, triple sec, lemon juice, and cola.

margarita.description: A classic cocktail made with tequila, lime juice, and orange liqueur.

beer.description: A refreshing alcoholic beverage brewed from malted grains.

wine.description: An elegant alcoholic beverage made from fermented grapes.

cider.description: An alcoholic beverage made from fermented apple juice.

champagne.description: An elegant alcoholic beverage made from fermented grapes.

sake.description: A traditional Japanese rice wine with a mild and slightly sweet flavor.

white claw.description: A popular low-calorie alcoholic seltzer with various fruit flavors.

whiskey.description: A distilled alcoholic beverage made from fermented grain mash.

tequila.description: A strong Mexican spirit made from the blue agave plant.

gin.description: A spirit flavored with juniper berries and other botanicals.

vodka.description: A distilled alcoholic beverage made from fermented grain mash.

rum.description: A distilled alcoholic beverage made from sugarcane.

jager.description: A German digestif made with 56 herbs and spices.
